name: Jailjawn.GitHub.io
tagline: Github Pages Website for the JailJawn Project
body:
### Welcome to JailJawn.
JailJawn creates a graph from Philadelphia's prison population data.  The raw data is scraped from the web, provided as "Daily Census" on [phila.gov/prisons](http://www.phila.gov/prisons/Pages/default.aspx).  The goal of this project is to save this data over time, as the website from which the data is pulled provides no archived data, and provide a visualization to easily understand the data.  The data scraping has been automated to retrieve this data daily and store it using Firebase.  
### Current Efforts
Currently, coding efforts are focused on creating the graph from this data using amCharts.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
